org.jslipc.ipc.pipe

Class JslipcPipeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jslipc.ipc.pipe.JslipcPipeClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeoutAware

    public class JslipcPipeClient
extends Object
implements TimeoutAware
    This is an analogy to socket which requests a connection pipe from a JslipcPipeServer. Method connect(Class...) requests a new connection and waits for the server response.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JslipcPipeClient.DirectoryType
      The type of directory used to create the client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JslipcPipeClient

        public JslipcPipeClient(File directory,
                JslipcPipeClient.DirectoryType type)
                 throws IOException
        Creates a client talking to the JslipcPipeServer on the given directory. The directory may be either the server connect directory, or the HostDir parent directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory used to set up the connection.
        type - the type of the directory.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • JslipcPipeClient

        public JslipcPipeClient(File serverConnectDirectory)
                 throws IOException
        Creates a client talking to the JslipcPipeServer on the given directory.
        Parameters:
        serverConnectDirectory - the JslipcPipeServer directory.
        Throws:
        IOException
